sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéshengmen xià zhōu fàng shǔjià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les étudiants seront en vacances d'été la semaine prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Students will have summer vacation next week.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huódòng yuánmǎn jiéshù le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'événement s'est terminé avec succès.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The event ended successfully.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 会议的主题是环境保护。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì de zhǔtí shì huánjìng bǎohù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le thème de la conférence est la protection de l'environnement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The theme of the meeting is environmental protection.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxí xūyào bùduàn jīlěi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'apprentissage nécessite une accumulation continue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Learning requires continuous accumulation.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīn xuénián jiǔ yuèfèn kāishǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nouvelle année scolaire commence en septembre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The new school year starts in September.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yàowù yào ànshí fúyòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce médicament doit être pris à l'heure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This medicine should be taken on time.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū de jiǎo zhé le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le coin de ce livre est plié.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The corner of this book is folded.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qù shítáng chīfàn ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons manger à la cantine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go eat at the cafeteria.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ liǎng fèn càidān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi deux menus, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me two menus.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège guójiā fēicháng fù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pays est très riche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This country is very rich.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他一个人生活感到很孤单。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yī gè rén shēnghuó gǎndào hěn gūdān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il se sent très seul en vivant seul.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He feels very lonely living alone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng fān dào dì shí yè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez tourner à la page dix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn to page ten.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǎpà xià yǔ, wǒ yě yào qù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Même s'il pleut, j'irai quand même.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Even if it rains, I will go.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīngxing zài yèkōng zhōng shǎnzhe guāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les étoiles scintillent dans le ciel nocturne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The stars are shining in the night sky.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiàgé xiàjiàng le bǎi fēn zhī shí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le prix a baissé de dix pour cent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The price has dropped by ten percent.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā pǎo de xiàng fēng yīyàng shìde.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il court comme le vent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He runs as fast as the wind.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào zhèngquè kàndài shìwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons voir les choses correctement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should view things correctly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīfu gān le méiyǒu?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les vêtements sont-ils secs ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Are the clothes dry?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gānggāng chūqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il vient de sortir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He just went out.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 大多数人同意这个计划。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàduōshù rén tóngyì zhège jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La plupart des gens sont d'accord avec ce plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Most people agree with this plan.
